# Privacy Policy

Last updated: August 5, 2023

This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal
information when you use the "Browser" application ("the App"), a ChatGPT
plugin developed by Lionel Kubwimana.

Information We Collect

We may collect non-personal usage data to improve the functionality and user
experience of the App.

How We Use Your Information

Any information we collect is used solely for the purpose of improving the
App.

Data Protection

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of any
information we collect.
sharing:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to third
parties.
